title: Topological character of the antiferromagnetic EuMg$_{2}$Bi$_{2}$
summary: Antiferromagnetic EuM$_{2}$Pn$_{2}$ compounds, where M is a metal element and Pn is a pnictogen element, have been recognized as candidates for realizing a topologically nontrivial electronic structure. In this paper, we focus on EuMg$_2$Bi$_2$, whose topological nature still remains unclear. We present a comprehensive study based on several experimental and theoretical techniques. Magnetic susceptibility, electrical resistivity, and specific heat capacity measurements confirm the existence of an antiferromagnetic ordering. The electronic band structure was investigated by high-resolution angle-resolved photoemission spectroscopy (ARPES), supported by ab initio calculations. ARPES measurement reveals that the electronic structure of this system is dominated by linearly dispersive hole-like bands near the Fermi level. Theoretical analyses of the electronic band structure indicates that EuMg$_2$Bi$_2$ is a strong topological insulator, which should be reflected in the presence of a metallic surface state. We also theoretically examine the magnetic-field-induced anomalous Hall conductivity, confirming previously reported observations.

AI.tldr: EuMg₂Bi₂被确认为强拓扑绝缘体，具有反铁磁序和线性色散的类空穴能带，存在金属表面态和磁场诱导的反常霍尔电导。
AI.motivation: 研究EuMg₂Bi₂的拓扑性质，因为EuM₂Pn₂化合物被认为是实现拓扑非平凡电子结构的候选材料，但EuMg₂Bi₂的拓扑性质尚不明确。
AI.method: 采用多种实验和理论技术：磁化率、电阻率、比热容测量确认反铁磁序；高分辨率角分辨光电子能谱(ARPES)研究电子能带结构；第一性原理计算支持；理论分析电子能带结构和磁场诱导的反常霍尔电导。
AI.result: 实验确认EuMg₂Bi₂存在反铁磁序；ARPES显示费米能级附近存在线性色散的类空穴能带；理论分析表明EuMg₂Bi₂是强拓扑绝缘体，应存在金属表面态；理论计算证实了先前报道的磁场诱导反常霍尔电导。
AI.conclusion: EuMg₂Bi₂被确认为强拓扑绝缘体，具有反铁磁序和线性色散的类空穴能带，存在金属表面态和磁场诱导的反常霍尔电导，为拓扑材料研究提供了重要案例。

title: Altermagnetism Induced Bogoliubov Fermi Surfaces Form Topological Superconductivity
summary: We propose a novel type of topological superconductivity based on Bogoliubov Fermi surfaces (BFSs) in an altermagnetic topological insulator proximitized by an s-wave superconductor. The 3D altermagnetic topological insulator is characterized by zero-energy surface states in bulk nodal-ring phases and anisotropically shifted surface Dirac cones in topological insulating phases. It is potentially realized in \mathrm{EuIn_{2}As_{2}}. The altermagnetic order in combination with superconductivity gives rise to highly anisotropic superconducting gaps with crystal-facet-dependent BFSs at the physical boundaries. These particular BFSs provide distinct platforms to realize Majorana zero modes (MZMs). We propose a quasi-1D nanowire in which the anisotropic BFSs experience topological phase transitions due to quantum confinement leading to MZMs at its ends. We further consider vortex phase transitions in the superconducting altermagnetic topological insulators. Remarkably, we find that the altermagnetic order allows us to transit between two distinct type of MZMs, one type is located at the vortex line, while the other type is located at the physical boundaries. Our work paves a new avenue utilizing altermagnetism-induced BFSs to engineer topological superconductivity through crystal anisotropy and quantum confinement.

AI.tldr: 提出基于反铁磁拓扑绝缘体中Bogoliubov费米面的新型拓扑超导性，利用晶体各向异性和量子限制实现Majorana零模
AI.motivation: 探索利用反铁磁性和超导性的结合来创造新型拓扑超导态，特别是通过反铁磁诱导的Bogoliubov费米面来实现Majorana零模
AI.method: 在反铁磁拓扑绝缘体(EuIn₂As₂)上近邻耦合s波超导体，利用反铁磁序和超导性的相互作用产生高度各向异性的超导能隙和Bogoliubov费米面，通过准一维纳米线量子限制和涡旋相变实现拓扑相变
AI.result: 实现了晶体晶面依赖的Bogoliubov费米面，在准一维纳米线末端产生Majorana零模，发现了反铁磁序允许在涡旋线和物理边界两种不同类型的Majorana零模之间转换
AI.conclusion: 这项工作开辟了利用反铁磁性诱导的Bogoliubov费米面，通过晶体各向异性和量子限制来设计拓扑超导性的新途径

title: Finite-Temperature Thermally-Assisted-Occupation Density Functional Theory, Ab Initio Molecular Dynamics, and Quantum Mechanics/Molecular Mechanics Methods
summary: Recently, thermally-assisted-occupation density functional theory (TAO-DFT) [J.-D. Chai, J. Chem. Phys. 136, 154104 (2012)] has been demonstrated to be an efficient and accurate electronic structure method for studying the ground-state properties of large multi-reference (MR) systems at absolute zero. To explore the thermal equilibrium properties of large MR systems at finite electronic temperatures, in the present work, we propose the finite-temperature (FT) extension of TAO-DFT, denoted as FT-TAO-DFT. Besides, to unlock the dynamical information of large MR systems at finite temperatures, FT-TAO-DFT is combined with ab initio molecular dynamics, leading to FT-TAO-AIMD. In addition, we also develop FT-TAO-DFT-based quantum mechanics/molecular mechanics (QM/MM), denoted as FT-TAO-QM/MM, to provide a cost-effective description of the thermal equilibrium properties of a QM subsystem with MR character embedded in an MM environment at finite temperatures. Moreover, the FT-TAO-DFT, FT-TAO-AIMD, and FT-TAO-QM/MM methods are employed to explore the radical nature and infrared (IR) spectra of n-acenes (n = 2--6), consisting of n linearly fused benzene rings, in vacuum and in an argon (Ar) matrix at finite temperatures. According to our calculations, for n-acenes at 1000 K or below, the electronic temperature effects on the radical nature and IR spectra are very minor, while the nuclear temperature effects on these properties are noticeable. For n-acene in an Ar matrx at absolute zero, the Ar matrix has minimal impact on the radical nature of n-acene, while the co-deposition procedure of n-acene and Ar atoms may affect the IR spectrum of n-acene.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了有限温度热辅助占据密度泛函理论（FT-TAO-DFT）及其与分子动力学和QM/MM的结合方法，用于研究多参考系统在有限温度下的热平衡性质，并以并苯为例验证了方法的有效性。
AI.motivation: TAO-DFT已被证明是研究绝对零度下大型多参考系统基态性质的有效方法，但需要扩展到有限温度以探索多参考系统在有限电子温度下的热平衡性质。
AI.method: 提出了FT-TAO-DFT方法，将其与从头算分子动力学结合得到FT-TAO-AIMD，并开发了FT-TAO-QM/MM方法。这些方法应用于研究并苯（n=2-6）在真空和氩基质中的自由基性质和红外光谱。
AI.result: 对于1000K以下的并苯，电子温度对其自由基性质和红外光谱影响很小，而核温度对这些性质有显著影响。在绝对零度的氩基质中，氩基质对并苯的自由基性质影响很小，但共沉积过程可能影响其红外光谱。
AI.conclusion: 成功开发了FT-TAO-DFT及相关方法，为研究大型多参考系统在有限温度下的热平衡和动力学性质提供了有效工具，并揭示了温度和环境对并苯性质的影响规律。

title: High-quality and field resilient microwave resonators on Ge/SiGe quantum well heterostructures
summary: Superconducting resonators integrated with Ge quantum wells (QWs) offer a promising platform for hybrid quantum devices. Yet, in the most common heterostructure architectures, they have so far been limited by sizable photon losses. Here, we report the fabrication and characterization of microwave resonators patterned in the Al thin film of an in-situ grown superconductor/semiconductor hybrid heterostructure (HS). The semiconductor part of this hybrid HS is grown on a commercial Ge substrate. We consistently achieve internal quality factors $Q_i>1000$, surpassing previous results on Ge QW heterostructures grown using the concept of a virtual Ge substrate on Si substrates. We reach $Q_i \approx 49000$ at single-photon occupation and a plateau of $Q_i \approx 20000$ at sub-one photon, an order of magnitude larger than any previously reported value of resonators on Ge QW structures at low power. We further characterize the thin Al film forming the resonator, extracting its kinetic inductance and superconducting gap, and studying its magnetic field dependence. Notably, the resonance remains well-defined up to in-plane magnetic fields of 850 mT. A hysteresis emerges in the out-of-plane magnetic field dependence, for both the resonance frequency and the quality factor, indicating an interesting interplay between vortex- and quasiparticle loss mechanisms.

AI.tldr: 在锗量子阱异质结构上制备的微波谐振器实现了高质量因子，在单光子水平达到Qi≈49000，比之前报道值高一个数量级，且能承受高达850 mT的面内磁场。
AI.motivation: 锗量子阱与超导谐振器集成的混合量子器件具有潜力，但现有异质结构存在显著光子损耗问题，限制了器件性能。
AI.method: 采用原位生长的超导体/半导体混合异质结构，在商用锗衬底上生长半导体部分，然后制备铝薄膜微波谐振器，并系统表征其性能。
AI.result: 内部质量因子Qi>1000，在单光子水平达到Qi≈49000，低功率下Qi≈20000，比之前报道值高一个数量级。谐振器能承受850 mT面内磁场，面外磁场下出现频率和质量因子的磁滞现象。
AI.conclusion: 该工作展示了高质量锗量子阱异质结构谐振器的实现，为混合量子器件提供了有前景的平台，并揭示了涡旋和准粒子损耗机制之间的相互作用。

title: Chemically-Informed Machine Learning Approach for Prediction of Reactivity Ratios in Radical Copolymerization
summary: Predicting monomer reactivity ratios is crucial for controlling monomer sequence distribution in copolymers and their properties. Traditional experimental methods of determining reactivity ratios are time-consuming and resource-intensive, while existing computational methods often struggle with accuracy or scalability. Here, we present a method that combines unsupervised learning with artificial neural networks to predict reactivity ratios in radical copolymerization. By applying spectral clustering to physicochemical features of monomers, we identified three distinct monomer groups with characteristic reactivity patterns. This computationally efficient clustering approach revealed specific monomer group interactions leading to different sequence arrangements, including alternating, random, block, and gradient copolymers, providing chemical insights for initial exploration. Building upon these insights, we trained artificial neural networks to achieve quantitative reactivity ratio predictions. We explored two integration strategies including direct feature concatenation, and cluster-specific training, which demonstrated performance enhancements for targeted chemical domains compared to general training with equivalent sample sizes. However, models utilizing complete datasets outperformed specialized models trained on focused subsets, revealing a fundamental trade-off between chemical specificity and data availability. This work demonstrates that unsupervised learning offers rapid chemical insight for exploratory analysis, while supervised learning provides the accuracy necessary for final design predictions, with optimal strategies depending on data availability and application requirements.

AI.tldr: 结合无监督学习（谱聚类）和人工神经网络预测自由基共聚中的单体反应性比，通过聚类识别单体分组模式，再用神经网络进行定量预测，平衡化学特异性和数据可用性。
AI.motivation: 传统实验方法测定单体反应性比耗时耗资源，现有计算方法在准确性或可扩展性方面存在不足，需要开发更高效准确的预测方法。
AI.method: 采用无监督学习（谱聚类）对单体的物理化学特征进行分析，识别出三个具有特征反应模式的单体组；然后训练人工神经网络进行定量预测，探索了直接特征拼接和聚类特定训练两种集成策略。
AI.result: 谱聚类方法揭示了导致不同序列排列（交替、随机、嵌段、梯度共聚物）的特定单体组相互作用；神经网络在针对性化学领域表现出性能提升，但完整数据集训练的模型优于专门子集训练的模型，揭示了化学特异性和数据可用性之间的权衡。
AI.conclusion: 无监督学习为探索性分析提供快速化学洞察，而监督学习为最终设计预测提供必要准确性；最佳策略取决于数据可用性和应用需求，两者结合可实现高效准确的单体反应性比预测。

title: Semi-automated estimation of hydrogenic initial states for localized Wannier functions
summary: We present a semi-automated method for obtaining an initial estimate of Wannier functions, designed to facilitate the construction of Wannier functions for describing low-energy effective models of solids, particularly those relevant to strongly correlated electron systems. Our approach automatically determines the hydrogenic projections orbitals and the center of the Wannier functions from information on Bloch wavefunctions at the $Γ$ point. This method is integrated into cif2qewan, enabling seamless generation of input files for Quantum ESPRESSO and Wannier90. We validate our method through applications to both inorganic and organic compounds, such as Si, SrVO$_3$, FeSe, Na$_8$Al$_6$Si$_6$O$_{24}$, and (TMTTF)$_2$PF$_6$. The obtained results demonstrate that our semi-automated projections give a good initial estimate of the Wannier functions. We also show the comparisons with other methods for estimating the initial states of the Wannier functions, such as the Selected Columns of the Density Matrix (SCDM). Our methodology shows an efficient way to construct Wannier functions, paving the way for high-throughput calculations in the study of complex materials.

AI.tldr: 提出一种半自动化方法，用于获取Wannier函数的初始估计，旨在简化强关联电子系统低能有效模型的构建。
AI.motivation: 构建Wannier函数对于描述固体的低能有效模型（特别是强关联电子系统）至关重要，但传统方法需要手动选择投影轨道和中心，过程繁琐且容易出错。
AI.method: 基于Γ点的布洛赫波函数信息，自动确定类氢投影轨道和Wannier函数中心，并将该方法集成到cif2qewan工具中，实现从晶体结构到Quantum ESPRESSO和Wannier90输入文件的无缝生成。
AI.result: 在Si、SrVO₃、FeSe、Na₈Al₆Si₆O₂₄和(TMTTF)₂PF₆等无机和有机化合物上验证，结果表明半自动化投影能提供良好的Wannier函数初始估计。与SCDM等其他方法相比，该方法表现出高效性。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为构建Wannier函数提供了高效途径，为复杂材料的高通量计算研究铺平了道路。

title: Run and Tumble Dynamics of Biased Quantum Trajectories in a Monitored Qubit
summary: We investigate the active stochastic dynamics of a qubit subjected to continuous measurement and conditional feedback. The stochastic equation governing the state vector trajectory of the qubit can be mapped, in the high-diffusion limit, to the dynamics of a classical persistent Run-and-Tumble Particle (p-RTP) in a bounded one-dimensional domain. The mapping enables us to use analytical results from classical active matter to derive an approximate non-equilibrium steady-state (NESS) distribution for the monitored quantum system. The competition between the coherent Rabi drive and the measurement-induced feedback leads to a rich NESS phase displaying Zeno--anti-Zeno transition--which is statistically equivalent to the propulsion-induced trapping observed in confined active particles.

AI.tldr: 将连续测量和反馈控制下的量子比特动力学映射到经典持久性跑动-翻滚粒子模型，利用活性物质理论分析量子非平衡稳态
AI.motivation: 研究量子系统在连续测量和反馈控制下的非平衡动力学，探索量子测量与经典活性粒子之间的统计等价性
AI.method: 在高扩散极限下，将量子比特的随机动力学映射到一维有界域中的经典持久性跑动-翻滚粒子模型，利用活性物质理论推导近似非平衡稳态分布
AI.result: 相干Rabi驱动与测量诱导反馈的竞争导致丰富的非平衡稳态相，显示出Zeno-反Zeno转变，统计上等价于受限活性粒子的推进诱导俘获现象
AI.conclusion: 量子测量反馈系统与经典活性粒子之间存在深刻的统计等价性，为理解量子非平衡稳态提供了新的理论框架

title: Anisotropic electron-phonon coupling and chiral phonons in van der Waals room temperature ferromagnet Fe$_{5}$GeTe$_{2}$
comment: Main text: 9 pages, 4 figures + Supplemental Material: 18 pages, 17 figures
summary: The layered van der Waals Fe$_5$GeTe$_2$ (F5GT) compound exhibits room-temperature ferromagnetism, making it a promising candidate for technological applications. In our study, combined temperature- and polarization-dependent Raman measurements, along with modern {\it ab initio} calculations, reveal important aspects of the lattice dynamics. The angle dependence of Raman intensity under linear polarization configuration exhibits a strong tilt in the laboratory coordinate, indicating the existence of anisotropic electron-phonon coupling. The electron-phonon coupling was also examined via the Fano parameter of the asymmetric peak in the Raman spectra. Finally, the threefold rotational symmetry guarantees the existence of chiral phonons. We present direct spectroscopic evidence for these chiral vibrational modes through cross-circularly polarized Raman measurements, complemented by theoretical calculations of phonon circular polarization. Together, these results identify F5GT as an ideal platform for investigating emergent couplings among lattice, electronic, and magnetic degrees of freedom and for advancing the understanding of chiral phonons in magnetic van der Waals materials.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过拉曼光谱和理论计算揭示了Fe5GeTe2中的各向异性电子-声子耦合和手性声子，证明该材料是研究晶格、电子和磁自由度耦合的理想平台。
AI.motivation: Fe5GeTe2具有室温铁磁性，在技术应用中具有潜力。研究其晶格动力学特性，特别是电子-声子耦合和手性声子，有助于理解磁性范德华材料中的基本物理机制。
AI.method: 结合温度依赖和偏振依赖的拉曼测量，以及现代ab initio计算。使用线性偏振配置分析拉曼强度角度依赖，通过Fano参数研究电子-声子耦合，通过交叉圆偏振拉曼测量探测手性声子。
AI.result: 发现拉曼强度角度依赖表现出强烈倾斜，表明存在各向异性电子-声子耦合。通过Fano参数证实了电子-声子耦合。通过交叉圆偏振拉曼测量获得了手性振动模式的直接光谱证据，理论计算也支持手性声子的存在。
AI.conclusion: Fe5GeTe2是研究晶格、电子和磁自由度之间耦合的理想平台，为理解磁性范德华材料中的手性声子提供了重要进展。

title: From Interdependent Networks to Two-Interactions Physical Systems
summary: Recent advances have shown that introducing dependency interactions between two superconducting networks can trigger abrupt, hysteretic normal-superconductor phase transitions. In this study, we demonstrate that such behavior can also arise in a single-network superconducting system that features two distinct types of interactions: short-range electrical connectivity and long-range thermal dependency. Using experimental and simulation methods, we show that when sufficient heat is dissipated within a single-layer disordered superconducting network, the system undergoes a mixed-order phase transition marked by both a discontinuous change in resistance and critical scaling behavior. We find that the emergence and characteristics of these abrupt transitions depend critically on the thermal conductivity of the underlying substrate, establishing heat flow as the origin of the unique phase transition. Additionally, both experimental and numerical results reveal long-lived transient states and scaling dynamics near the critical point, consistent with spontaneous branching processes observed in interdependent networks theory. These findings strongly demonstrate that complex critical phenomena, such as mixed-order transitions, previously attributed to structurally interdependent systems, can also arise within single-layer physical systems when dual interactions coexist. Our results broaden the scope of the theory and experiments of phase transitions in interdependent networks and suggest new ways to design and control phase changes in physical, biological, and technological systems where two interactions are present.

AI.tldr: 单层超导网络中的短程电连接与长程热依赖相互作用可引发混合级相变，兼具电阻突变和临界标度行为
AI.motivation: 先前研究表明两个超导网络间的依赖相互作用可引发突变的正常-超导相变。本研究探讨单层网络系统中是否也能通过两种不同类型的相互作用（短程电连接和长程热依赖）产生类似行为
AI.method: 采用实验和模拟方法，研究单层无序超导网络在足够热量耗散下的相变行为，分析热导率对相变特性的影响
AI.result: 当单层超导网络内耗散足够热量时，系统经历混合级相变，表现为电阻的突变变化和临界标度行为。相变的出现和特性关键取决于基底的热导率，热流是这种独特相变的起源。实验和数值结果均显示临界点附近存在长寿命瞬态状态和标度动力学
AI.conclusion: 复杂临界现象（如混合级相变）不仅限于结构上相互依赖的系统，当单层物理系统中存在双重相互作用时也能出现。这拓宽了相互依赖网络相变理论和实验的范围，为设计和控制在物理、生物和技术系统中存在两种相互作用的相变提供了新途径

title: Topological resolution of conical intersection seams and the coupled cluster bifurcation via mixed Hodge modules
comment: 12 pages, 5 figures. Includes Supplementary Information. Code available at https://github.com/prasoon-s/QuMorpheus
summary: The rigorous description of Conical Intersections (CIs) remains the central challenge of non-adiabatic quantum chemistry. While the ``Yarkony Seam'' -- the $(3N-8)$-dimensional manifold of degeneracy -- is well-understood geometrically, its accurate characterization by high-level electronic structure methods is plagued by numerical instabilities. Specifically, standard Coupled Cluster (CC) theory suffers from root bifurcations near Ground State CIs, rendering the ``Gold Standard'' of chemistry inapplicable where it is needed most. Here, we present \textbf{QuMorpheus}, an open-source computational package that resolves these singularities by implementing a topological framework based on Dissipative Mixed Hodge Modules (DMHM) [P. Saurabh, arXiv:2512.19487 (2025)]. By algorithmically mapping the CC polynomial equations to a spectral sheaf, we compute the exact Monodromy ($μ$) invariants of the intersection. We demonstrate that this automated algebraic geometry approach correctly identifies the physical ground state topology in the Köhn-Tajti model and resolves the intersection seams of realistic chemical systems, including Ethylene and the Chloronium ion ($\mathrm{H_2Cl^+}$). Furthermore, we apply QuMorpheus to the photoisomerization of Previtamin D, proving that the experimentally observed Woodward-Hoffmann selection rules are a direct consequence of a topological ``Monodromy Wall'' ($μ=1, γ=π$) rather than purely energetic barriers. This establishes a general software solution to the ``Yarkony Problem,'' enabling the robust, automated mapping of global intersection seams in complex molecular systems. The topological stability of these intersections allows for the control protocols discussed in Ref.[P. Saurabh, Submitted to Phys. Rev. X (2025)].

AI.tldr: QuMorpheus是一个开源计算软件包，通过基于耗散混合霍奇模块的拓扑框架解决锥形交叉点的数值不稳定性问题，实现全局交叉缝的自动化映射。
AI.motivation: 锥形交叉点的精确描述是非绝热量子化学的核心挑战。标准耦合簇理论在基态锥形交叉点附近存在根分叉问题，导致化学的"黄金标准"在最需要的地方无法应用。
AI.method: 采用基于耗散混合霍奇模块的拓扑框架，通过算法将CC多项式方程映射到谱层，计算交叉点的精确单值不变量。开发了开源软件包QuMorpheus来实现这一方法。
AI.result: 成功识别了Köhn-Tajti模型中的物理基态拓扑，解决了乙烯和氯离子等实际化学系统的交叉缝问题。应用于维生素D前体的光异构化，证明实验观察到的Woodward-Hoffmann选择规则是拓扑"单值墙"的直接结果。
AI.conclusion: QuMorpheus为"Yarkony问题"提供了通用软件解决方案，实现了复杂分子系统中全局交叉缝的鲁棒自动化映射，这些交叉点的拓扑稳定性为控制协议提供了基础。

title: Optical cooling of nuclear spins in GaAs/(Al,Ga)As quantum wells at subkelvin temperatures: Evidence of the dynamic self-polarization of nuclear spins
summary: We investigate the dynamic polarization of nuclear spins in a nominally undoped GaAs/Al$_{0.35}$Ga$_{0.65}$As quantum well using two complementary experimental approaches: time-resolved Kerr rotation and optical orientation measurements of photoluminescence. Using the first technique, we measure a remarkably large Overhauser field of 3.1 T in a geometry close to the Faraday configuration for a 19.7 nm wide quantum well at a temperature of 1.6 K. A nuclear spin temperature of 6.4 $μ$K is measured at an external magnetic field of 0.006 T following an adiabatic sweep from 0.6 T. Despite the quadrupole-induced nuclear spin splitting inherent to nanostructures, the nuclear spin system is found to follow the predictions of spin temperature theory. Using the optical orientation of the photoluminescence, we investigated nuclear spin dynamics at millikelvin temperatures down to 300 mK. At a temperature of 500 mK, an Overhauser field of 160 mT is generated in an oblique but nearly Voigt magnetic field using low optical power to avoid heating. The nuclear polarization build-up time is of 150 s, consistent with earlier reports at higher temperatures, where hyperfine scattering on free photoexcited electrons governs relaxation. At 500 mK, the onset of dynamic self-polarization of nuclear spins is observed, which becomes more pronounced as the lattice temperature is further reduced to 300 mK. The estimated nuclear spin temperature in the dynamic self-polarization regime can be as low as 200 nK.

AI.tldr: 在GaAs/AlGaAs量子阱中通过两种实验方法研究核自旋动态极化，测量到高达3.1T的Overhauser场和低至200nK的核自旋温度
AI.motivation: 研究纳米结构中核自旋的动态极化行为，特别是在低温条件下核自旋系统的行为是否遵循自旋温度理论预测
AI.method: 使用两种互补实验方法：时间分辨Kerr旋转测量和光致发光的光学取向测量，在1.6K至300mK温度范围内研究量子阱中的核自旋极化
AI.result: 测量到高达3.1T的Overhauser场，核自旋温度低至6.4μK；在500mK观察到动态自极化现象，300mK时核自旋温度可低至200nK
AI.conclusion: 尽管纳米结构存在四极矩诱导的核自旋分裂，核自旋系统仍遵循自旋温度理论预测；在毫开尔文温度下观察到动态自极化现象

title: NMIRacle: Multi-modal Generative Molecular Elucidation from IR and NMR Spectra
summary: Molecular structure elucidation from spectroscopic data is a long-standing challenge in Chemistry, traditionally requiring expert interpretation. We introduce NMIRacle, a two-stage generative framework that builds upon recent paradigms in AI-driven spectroscopy with minimal assumptions. In the first stage, NMIRacle learns to reconstruct molecular structures from count-aware fragment encodings, which capture both fragment identities and their occurrences. In the second stage, a spectral encoder maps input spectroscopic measurements (IR, 1H-NMR, 13C-NMR) into a latent embedding that conditions the pre-trained generator. This formulation bridges fragment-level chemical modeling with spectral evidence, yielding accurate molecular predictions. Empirical results show that NMIRacle outperforms existing baselines on molecular elucidation, while maintaining robust performance across increasing levels of molecular complexity.

AI.tldr: NMIRacle是一个两阶段生成框架，通过片段编码和光谱编码相结合，从光谱数据（IR、1H-NMR、13C-NMR）中准确预测分子结构。
AI.motivation: 传统上，从光谱数据解析分子结构需要专家解释，这是一个长期存在的化学挑战。作者希望开发一个AI驱动的框架，减少对专家知识的依赖，实现自动化的分子结构解析。
AI.method: NMIRacle采用两阶段生成框架：第一阶段学习从计数感知的片段编码重建分子结构；第二阶段通过光谱编码器将输入光谱数据映射到潜在嵌入，用于条件化预训练的生成器。这种方法将片段级化学建模与光谱证据相结合。
AI.result: 实验结果表明，NMIRacle在分子解析任务上优于现有基线方法，并且在分子复杂度增加的情况下仍能保持稳健的性能。
AI.conclusion: NMIRacle成功地将片段级化学建模与光谱证据相结合，为从光谱数据解析分子结构提供了一个有效的AI驱动框架，减少了传统方法对专家知识的依赖。

title: Jordan-Wigner Transformation for the Description of Strong Correlation in Fermionic Systems
summary: Seniority is a useful way of organizing Hilbert space for strongly correlated systems. The exact zero-seniority wave function, doubly-occupied configuration interaction (DOCI), provides accurate results (given the right orbitals) for many strongly-correlated electronic systems, but has combinatorial computational cost. In many cases, pair coupled cluster doubles provides a polynomial-cost approximation that closely reproduces the energies of DOCI, but it breaks down in some cases and, as shown herein, it does not provide particularly good density matrices. In this work, we demonstrate that by using the Jordan-Wigner approximation to turn the seniority zero problem back into a fermionic one, we can provide variational results of DOCI quality for the Hubbard model and a few small molecular dissociation examples, with polynomial cost, both for the energies and for density matrices, all while being protected from collapse.

AI.tldr: 通过Jordan-Wigner近似将seniority零问题转化为费米子问题，实现了多项式计算成本下获得DOCI质量的结果，包括能量和密度矩阵，同时避免崩溃。
AI.motivation: DOCI（双占据组态相互作用）虽然能为强关联电子系统提供精确结果，但计算成本呈组合爆炸增长。现有的对耦合簇双激发方法虽然计算成本为多项式，但在某些情况下会失效，且无法提供良好的密度矩阵。
AI.method: 使用Jordan-Wigner近似将seniority零问题转化回费米子问题，通过这种方法以多项式计算成本获得DOCI质量的结果，包括能量和密度矩阵，同时保持变分性并避免崩溃。
AI.result: 在Hubbard模型和几个小分子解离示例中，该方法能够以多项式计算成本提供与DOCI质量相当的变分结果，包括能量和密度矩阵，同时受到保护而不会崩溃。
AI.conclusion: 通过Jordan-Wigner近似将seniority零问题转化为费米子问题，成功实现了多项式计算成本下获得DOCI质量的结果，解决了现有方法在计算成本和精度方面的局限性。

title: The role of charge in thermodynamic uncertainty relations
summary: We demonstrate that the charge value of transport mechanisms heavily impacts the validity of thermodynamic uncertainty relations (TURs). Specifically, we show within the framework of full counting statistics, that the recently established quantum TUR can be violated by the presence of transport processes that carry more than one charge, like Andreev reflection processes in normal metal-superconductor junctions. We propose a modified quantum TUR, which incorporates the charge value and demonstrate that this charge-dependent quantum TUR can only be violated if the highest charge transport process exceeds this charge value. In particular, we establish that the breaking of the quantum TUR solely originates from the charge value of the highest charge transport process. Namely, our analytical considerations do not invoke the existence of superconductivity, and these considerations generally hold for non-interacting electronic transport which can be described by the scattering formalism.

AI.tldr: 论文发现传输机制的电荷值严重影响热力学不确定性关系(TURs)的有效性，特别是量子TUR会被携带多个电荷的传输过程违反，并提出了包含电荷值的修正量子TUR。
AI.motivation: 研究热力学不确定性关系在量子传输系统中的有效性，特别是当传输过程涉及多个电荷时（如超导-正常金属结中的Andreev反射），现有的量子TUR可能被违反。
AI.method: 在全计数统计框架下，分析非相互作用电子传输的散射形式，特别关注携带多个电荷的传输过程，提出包含电荷值的修正量子TUR。
AI.result: 证明量子TUR可以被携带多个电荷的传输过程违反，建立了电荷依赖的量子TUR，该关系仅在最高电荷传输过程的电荷值超过特定值时才会被违反。
AI.conclusion: 量子TUR的违反完全源于最高电荷传输过程的电荷值，这一结论不依赖于超导性的存在，适用于所有可用散射形式描述的非相互作用电子传输系统。

title: Electronic and magnetic properties of the NdNiO$_2$/SrTiO$_3$ thin films
summary: The hole-doped NdNiO$_2$ layer deposited on the SrTiO$_{3}$ surface exhibits unconventional superconductivity. Here, we present a systematic study of the electronic and magnetic properties of the NdNiO$_2$ superconductor using the density functional theory (DFT). The strong local Coulomb interactions in the Ni($3d)$ and Nd($4f$) states are included within the DFT+$U$ method. The effect of Sr doping on the electronic band structure and density of states was studied for the NdNiO$_2$ thin films deposited on the SrTiO$_3$ (001) surface. The results obtained for the uncapped thin films were compared with the calculations for the NdNiO$_2$ films capped by the SrTiO$_3$ layer. We have found significant changes in the electronic structure and magnetic properties of the thin films compared to the bulk crystal.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过DFT+U方法系统研究了SrTiO3衬底上NdNiO2超导薄膜的电子和磁性性质，发现薄膜与块体晶体相比存在显著差异
AI.motivation: 研究NdNiO2/SrTiO3体系中非常规超导性的电子和磁性基础，特别是薄膜结构与块体材料的差异
AI.method: 采用密度泛函理论(DFT)结合DFT+U方法，考虑Ni(3d)和Nd(4f)态的强局域库仑相互作用，研究未覆盖和SrTiO3覆盖的NdNiO2薄膜
AI.result: 发现薄膜与块体晶体相比，电子结构和磁性性质发生显著变化，Sr掺杂对电子能带结构和态密度有重要影响
AI.conclusion: NdNiO2超导薄膜的电子和磁性性质与块体材料存在本质差异，这些差异对理解其非常规超导机制具有重要意义

title: Symmetric Superconducting Dome Accompanied by Non-Fermi Liquid Transport in Ionic Liquid Gated-MoS2
summary: In strongly correlated superconductors, the emergence of superconductivity is often accompanied by anomalous normal state. The connection between these two phenomena is considered crucial for understanding the underlying unconventional pairing mechanisms. In this study, we report analogous behavior in MoS2, a band insulator devoid of long-range magnetic order. Through ionic liquid gating, continuous doping control from the underdoped to the overdoped regime was achieved, revealing a symmetric superconducting dome that holds characteristic scaling relations mirror the behavior of strongly correlated superconductors. Strikingly, this system exhibits pronounced non-Fermi liquid transport near optimal doping, characterized by a quasi-linear temperature dependence of resistivity over a wide range and a T2-dependent Hall angle cotangent. The strength of the non-Fermi liquid transport is positively correlated with the superconducting transition temperature, with both evolving synchronously across the phase diagram. These results highlight the potential of MoS2 as an ideal platform for studying the intrinsic connection between non-Fermi liquid transport and superconductivity.

AI.tldr: MoS2中通过离子液体门控实现连续掺杂，观察到对称超导穹顶和强关联超导体特征的比例关系，非费米液体输运与超导转变温度正相关。
AI.motivation: 研究强关联超导体中超导出现与异常正常态之间的联系，探索非常规配对机制。MoS2作为无长程磁序的带绝缘体，可能成为研究非费米液体输运与超导内在联系的理想平台。
AI.method: 使用离子液体门控技术对MoS2进行连续掺杂控制，从欠掺杂到过掺杂区域，测量电阻率和霍尔角等输运性质。
AI.result: 观察到对称的超导穹顶结构，具有类似强关联超导体的特征比例关系。在最佳掺杂附近出现显著的非费米液体输运行为：电阻率随温度呈准线性依赖，霍尔角余切呈T²依赖。非费米液体输运强度与超导转变温度正相关，两者在相图中同步演化。
AI.conclusion: MoS2可作为研究非费米液体输运与超导内在联系的理想平台，其行为类似于强关联超导体，尽管MoS2本身是无长程磁序的带绝缘体。

title: Iterative learning scheme for crystal structure prediction with anharmonic lattice dynamics
summary: First-principles based crystal structure prediction (CSP) methods have revealed an essential tool for the discovery of new materials. However, in solids close to displacive phase transitions, which are common in ferroelectrics, thermoelectrics, charge-density wave systems, or superconducting hydrides, the ionic contribution to the free energy and lattice anharmonicity become essential, limiting the capacity of CSP techniques to determine the thermodynamical stability of competing phases. While variational methods like the stochastic self-consistent harmonic approximation (SSCHA) accurately account for anharmonic lattice dynamics \emph{ab initio}, their high computational cost makes them impractical for CSP. Machine-learning interatomic potentials offer accelerated sampling of the energy landscape compared to purely first-principles approaches, but their reliance on extensive training data and limited generalization restricts practical applications. Here, we propose an iterative learning framework combining evolutionary algorithms, atomic foundation models, and SSCHA to enable CSP with anharmonic lattice dynamics. Foundation models enable robust relaxations of random structures, drastically reducing required training data. Applied to the highly anharmonic H$_3$S system, our framework achieves good agreement with the benchmarks based on density functional theory, accurately predicting phase stability and vibrational properties from 50 to 200 GPa. Importantly, we find that the statistical averaging in the SSCHA reduces the error in the free energy evaluation, avoiding the need for extremely high accuracy of machine-learning potentials. This approach bridges the gap between data efficiency and predictive power, establishing a practical pathway for CSP with anharmonic lattice dynamics.

AI.tldr: 提出结合进化算法、原子基础模型和SSCHA的迭代学习框架，实现考虑非简谐晶格动力学的晶体结构预测，在H3S系统中验证了有效性。
AI.motivation: 传统晶体结构预测方法在处理接近位移型相变的固体时，由于离子自由能贡献和晶格非简谐性变得重要，难以准确评估相的热力学稳定性。虽然SSCHA能准确处理非简谐晶格动力学，但计算成本过高；机器学习势能面方法依赖大量训练数据且泛化能力有限。
AI.method: 提出迭代学习框架：结合进化算法进行结构搜索，使用原子基础模型进行结构弛豫（大幅减少训练数据需求），最后用SSCHA计算非简谐自由能。SSCHA的统计平均降低了自由能评估误差，避免了对机器学习势能面极高精度的要求。
AI.result: 在高非简谐性H3S系统中，框架在50-200 GPa压力范围内与基于密度泛函理论的基准结果吻合良好，准确预测了相稳定性和振动性质。统计平均显著降低了自由能评估误差。
AI.conclusion: 该框架在数据效率和预测能力之间架起桥梁，为考虑非简谐晶格动力学的晶体结构预测建立了实用途径，特别适用于铁电体、热电材料、电荷密度波系统和超导氢化物等体系。

title: Intercalant-induced Kekule ordering and gap opening in quasi-free-standing graphene
summary: We present a comprehensive investigation of the structural and electronic properties of Sn intercalated buffer layers on SiC(0001) using low-temperature scanning tunneling microscopy and spectroscopy (LT-STM/STS), spot-profile analysis low-energy electron diffraction (SPA-LEED), and density functional theory (DFT) calculations. Sn intercalation effectively decouples the buffer layer, yielding quasi-free-standing monolayer graphene (QFMLG) while introducing local lattice distortions. Bias-dependent STM imaging revealed the coexistence of conventional and Kekule-ordered graphene domains, governed by the underlying Sn(1x1) reconstruction at the SiC interface. The measured STS spectra exhibit good agreement with DFT results. However, achieving homogeneous Sn(1x1) domains remains challenging, apparently, due to strain within the Sn monolayer, which drives the emergence of Kekule distortions and the associated electronic band-gap opening omogeneously in graphene. These findings highlight the crucial role of intercalant homogeneity and strain in tuning graphene`s structural and electronic properties.

AI.tldr: Sn插层SiC缓冲层可制备准自由单层石墨烯，但Sn层应变导致Kekulé畸变和带隙打开，影响石墨烯均匀性
AI.motivation: 研究Sn插层对SiC上石墨烯缓冲层的结构和电子性质影响，探索通过插层调控石墨烯性质的方法
AI.method: 采用低温扫描隧道显微镜/谱、点剖面分析低能电子衍射和密度泛函理论计算相结合的方法
AI.result: Sn插层成功解耦缓冲层得到准自由单层石墨烯，但Sn层应变导致Kekulé有序石墨烯畴形成和带隙打开，均匀Sn(1x1)畴难以实现
AI.conclusion: 插层剂均匀性和应变在调控石墨烯结构和电子性质中起关键作用，Sn插层虽能制备石墨烯但均匀性控制仍是挑战

title: Ab initio Simulations of EMI-BF4 Neutral-Surface Interactions in Electrospray Thrusters
summary: Electrospray thrusters promise compact, high specific impulse propulsion for small spacecraft, yet ground characterization remains confounded by secondary species emission and incomplete diagnostics of neutral products. To address these limitations, we perform energy-resolved mixed quantum/classical (QM/MM) ab initio molecular dynamics (MD) of neutral 1-ethyl-3-methylimidazolium tetrafluoroborate, EMI-BF4, colliding with Au extractor surfaces with impact energies from 10 to 100 eV to resolve fragment species spectra, charge states, kinetic energy partitioning, and scattering geometry. The simulations reveal a three-stage sequence with impact energy: the low energy regime, 10 to 20 eV, which favors ionic dissociation, intermediate energy regime, between 30 to 40 eV, opens a neutralization window, and high energy regime, greater than 50 eV, drives covalent fragmentation into many light products with mixed charge states. Fractional energy distributions show a transition from few-body, energy-concentrated outcomes in the low energy regime to many-body, energy-dispersed outcomes in the high energy regime. Deflection angle distributions exhibit a strong mass-to-angle anti-correlation such that heavier fragments favor small deflection, whereas lighter fragments populate larger deflection angles. The fraction of transient metastables peaks near 50 eV, coinciding with abundant neutral fragment production. Importantly, neutral bombardment still produces charged secondaries at the target even when the upstream ion plume is fully suppressed by a decelerating electrode. These findings provide a basis for de-biasing facility measurements by pairing tandem time-of-flight secondary ion mass spectrometry and residual gas analyzer with suppression-bias corrections to inform the design of electrospray thrusters that reduce interception and contamination on extractor surfaces.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过量子/经典混合分子动力学模拟，分析了离子液体EMI-BF4与金提取器表面碰撞的碎片产生机制，揭示了不同能量区间下的碎片化模式，为电喷雾推进器地面测试的去偏校正提供了理论基础。
AI.motivation: 电喷雾推进器在地面测试中面临二次物种发射和中性产物诊断不完整的问题，需要更精确的碰撞过程理解来改进测试方法和推进器设计。
AI.method: 采用能量分辨的量子/经典混合从头算分子动力学模拟，研究EMI-BF4离子液体与金提取器表面在10-100 eV能量范围内的碰撞过程，分析碎片种类、电荷状态、动能分配和散射几何。
AI.result: 发现三阶段碰撞机制：10-20 eV低能区倾向于离子解离；30-40 eV中能区出现中性化窗口；50 eV以上高能区驱动共价键断裂产生多种轻质碎片。碎片质量与偏转角呈强反相关关系，中性轰击仍能产生带电二次产物。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果为通过串联飞行时间二次离子质谱和残余气体分析仪结合抑制偏压校正来去偏设施测量提供了基础，有助于设计减少提取器表面拦截和污染的电喷雾推进器。

title: Unveiling the Phase Diagram and Nonlinear Optical Responses of a Twisted Kitaev Chain
summary: Detecting Kitaev interactions in real materials remains challenge, as conventional experimental techniques often have difficulty distinguishing fractionalized excitations from other normal contributions. Terahertz two-dimensional coherent spectroscopy (2DCS) offers a novel approach for probing many-body phenomena, such as exotic excitations in quantum magnets. Motivated by recent experiments on CoNb$_2$O$_6$ and the development of the terahertz spectroscopy in Kitaev quantum spin liquid, we proposed a twisted Kitaev model for CoNb$_2$O$_6$ and determined the precise twist angle according to experimental specific-heat phase diagram. With this calibrated model, we found that non-rephasing diagonal and rephasing anti-diagonal signals appear in the 2DCS nonlinear response. The $x$ and $y$ components of the spin superexchange interactions split the rephasing signals into a grid of discrete peaks. We further demonstrate that the diagonal and the discrete rephasing signals primarily originate from two-spinon and four-spinon excitation processes based on numerical projection method. These findings indicate that even weak Kitaev interactions in quantum materials can be effectively detected via two-dimensional coherent spectroscopy .

AI.tldr: 该研究提出通过太赫兹二维相干光谱检测量子材料中的弱Kitaev相互作用，在CoNb₂O₆中建立了扭曲Kitaev模型，并发现二维相干光谱中的对角和非对角信号分别源于双自旋子和四自旋子激发过程。
AI.motivation: 检测真实材料中的Kitaev相互作用具有挑战性，因为传统实验技术难以区分分数化激发与其他正常贡献。太赫兹二维相干光谱为探测量子磁体中的奇异激发提供了新方法，特别是针对CoNb₂O₆等材料中弱Kitaev相互作用的检测。
AI.method: 为CoNb₂O₆提出扭曲Kitaev模型，根据实验比热相图确定精确扭曲角度。使用校准后的模型分析二维相干光谱非线性响应，通过数值投影方法识别信号来源。
AI.result: 发现非重相位对角信号和重相位反对角信号出现在二维相干光谱非线性响应中。自旋超交换相互作用的x和y分量将重相位信号分裂为离散峰网格。对角信号和离散重相位信号分别主要源于双自旋子和四自旋子激发过程。
AI.conclusion: 即使量子材料中的Kitaev相互作用很弱，也能通过二维相干光谱有效检测，这为探测分数化激发和Kitaev相互作用提供了新的实验方法。

title: Microscopic and spectroscopic evidences for multiple ion-exchange reactions controlling biomineralization of CaO.MgO.2SiO2 nanoceramics
summary: This study is focused on the mechanism of in vitro biomineralization on the surface of CaO.MgO.2SiO2 (diopside) nanostructured coatings by scanning electron microscopy, energy-dispersive X-ray spectroscopy and inductively coupled plasma spectroscopy assessments. A homogeneous diopside coating of almost 2 um in thickness was deposited on a medical-grade stainless steel by coprecipitation, dipping and sintering sequences. After soaking the sample in a simulated body fluid (SBF) for 14 days, a layer with the thickness of 8 μm is recognized to be substituted for the primary diopside deposit, suggesting the mineralization of apatite on the surface. Investigations revealed that the newly-formed layer is predominantly composed of Ca, P and Si, albeit with a biased accumulations of P and Si towards the surface and substrate, respectively. The variations in the ionic composition and pH of the SBF due to the incubation of the sample were also correlated with the above-interpreted biomineralization. In conclusion, the multiple ion-exchange reactions related to Ca, Mg, Si and P were found to be responsible for the in vitro bioactivity of nanodiopside.

AI.tldr: 纳米透辉石涂层在模拟体液中能诱导磷灰石矿化，表现出良好的体外生物活性
AI.motivation: 研究CaO.MgO.2SiO2（透辉石）纳米结构涂层的体外生物矿化机制，评估其在生物医学应用中的潜力
AI.method: 采用共沉淀、浸渍和烧结工艺在医用不锈钢上制备约2μm厚的均匀透辉石涂层，在模拟体液中浸泡14天，通过扫描电镜、能谱分析和电感耦合等离子体光谱评估矿化过程
AI.result: 浸泡14天后，原始透辉石涂层被约8μm厚的新层取代，新层主要由Ca、P和Si组成，其中P富集于表面，Si富集于基底附近；模拟体液离子组成和pH变化与生物矿化过程相关
AI.conclusion: 纳米透辉石的体外生物活性源于Ca、Mg、Si和P之间的多重离子交换反应，能有效诱导磷灰石矿化

title: Composition-Based Machine Learning for Screening Superconducting Ternary Hydrides from a Curated Dataset
summary: We present an ensemble machine-learning approach for composition-based, structure-agnostic screening of candidate superconductors among ternary hydrides under high pressure. Hydrogen-rich hydrides are known to exhibit high superconducting transition temperatures, and ternary or multinary hydrides can stabilize superconducting phases at reduced pressures through chemical compression. To systematically explore this vast compositional space, we construct an ensemble of 30 XGBoost regression models trained on a curated dataset of approximately 2000 binary and ternary hydride entries. The model ensemble is used to screen a broad set of A-B-H compositions at pressures of 100, 200, and 300 GPa, with screening outcomes evaluated statistically based on prediction consistency across ensemble members. This analysis highlights several high-scoring compositional systems, including Ca-Ti-H, Li-K-H, and Na-Mg-H, which were not explicitly included in the training dataset. In addition, feature-importance analysis indicates that elemental properties such as ionization energy and atomic radius contribute significantly to the learned composition-level trends in superconducting transition temperature. Overall, these results demonstrate the utility of ensemble-based machine learning as a primary screening tool for identifying promising regions of chemical space in superconducting hydrides.

AI.tldr: 使用集成机器学习方法筛选高压下三元氢化物中的潜在超导体，通过30个XGBoost模型在约2000个二元和三元氢化物数据集上训练，预测超导转变温度并识别出多个有前景的化学体系。
AI.motivation: 富氢氢化物具有高超导转变温度，三元或多元氢化物可通过化学压缩在较低压力下稳定超导相。然而，巨大的化学组成空间需要系统性的探索方法，传统实验筛选成本高昂且效率低。
AI.method: 构建30个XGBoost回归模型的集成学习框架，在约2000个二元和三元氢化物数据集上训练。使用该模型集成在100、200和300 GPa压力下筛选A-B-H组成，通过集成成员间预测一致性进行统计评估。
AI.result: 识别出多个高评分化学体系，包括Ca-Ti-H、Li-K-H和Na-Mg-H等未包含在训练数据集中的组成。特征重要性分析显示电离能和原子半径等元素性质对超导转变温度预测有重要贡献。
AI.conclusion: 集成机器学习可作为识别超导氢化物中有前景化学空间区域的有效初步筛选工具，为高压超导材料发现提供了高效的计算指导方法。

title: Electronic states at twist stacking faults in rhombohedral graphite
summary: Flat bands in graphitic materials emerged as a platform for realizing tunable correlated physics. As a nodal-line semimetal, rhombohedral graphite features flat drumhead surface states in the vicinity of the Dirac points, which carry a nontrivial topological charge. We present a comprehensive study on rhombohedral graphite with twist stacking faults. Using both the continuum models and the realistic tight-binding models, we show that the twist angle between the graphene layers can tune the interface states at such stacking faults. The evolution of interface states originates from the interplay between the moiré periodicity and Zak phase topology, predicting the occurrence of nearly flat bands throughout the moiré Brillouin zone. We further investigate the disorder-induced layer polarization and tunable Chern number for flat band, and characterize the relationship between the disorder strength and Chern number in twisted rhombohedral graphite.

AI.tldr: 扭曲堆垛层错可以调控菱面体石墨中的界面态，通过莫尔周期性与Zak相拓扑的相互作用产生近平坦能带，并实现可调陈数
AI.motivation: 石墨材料中的平坦能带是实现可调关联物理的平台。菱面体石墨作为节线半金属，在狄拉克点附近具有平坦的鼓面表面态，携带非平凡拓扑电荷。研究扭曲堆垛层错如何调控这些界面态具有重要意义。
AI.method: 使用连续模型和现实紧束缚模型，研究石墨烯层间扭曲角度对堆垛层错界面态的调控作用。分析莫尔周期性与Zak相拓扑的相互作用，并进一步研究无序诱导的层极化和平坦能带的可调陈数。
AI.result: 扭曲角度可以调控堆垛层错的界面态，莫尔周期性与Zak相拓扑的相互作用导致在整个莫尔布里渊区出现近平坦能带。无序强度与陈数之间存在可调控的关系，可以实现平坦能带的可调陈数。
AI.conclusion: 扭曲菱面体石墨中的堆垛层错为调控界面态提供了有效途径，通过扭曲角度可以实现平坦能带的拓扑性质调控，这为探索可调关联物理和拓扑相变提供了新平台。

title: Phantom LAM and LLI: Resistance and Hysteresis Bias in Voltage-Curve Degradation Mode Analysis
summary: Degradation mode analysis (DMA) is widely used to decompose capacity fade into loss of lithium inventory (LLI) and loss of active material (LAM) from low-rate voltage-capacity data. Yet the measured trace is a pseudo-OCV (pOCV) that includes two non-degradation contributions: an SOC-dependent ohmic drop and intrinsic charge-discharge hysteresis, especially in graphite--silicon oxide (C/SiOx) negative electrodes. We show these can dominate attribution and generate Phantom LAM/LLI --apparent material loss created by curve registration, branch choice and voltage-windowing rather than true degradation. Using two commercial 21700 cells (LG M50T: higher resistance; Molicel P45B: lower resistance), we extract an SOC-dependent instantaneous resistance $R_Ω(\mathrm{SOC})$ from the first $\sim$50,ms pulse step and apply an IR correction to pOCV before fitting. In LG M50T, IR correction lifts the low-rate discharge pOCV by $+13$--$27$,mV with ageing; without it, PE-LAM is increasingly under-diagnosed (to $-8.80%$ relative error at late life) and LLI is suppressed (median $-3.07%$), with compensating inflation of apparent graphite loss. In P45B, on a branch-fair $3.0$--$4.2$,V window, end-of-life charge-branch DMA reports higher PE-LAM ($+3.42$,pp) and LLI ($+5.36$,pp), while the discharge branch recovers larger Si-LAM (discharge--charge difference to $+14.38$,pp). Raising the lower cutoff ($2.5$--$4.2 \rightarrow 3.0$--$4.2$,V) further under-reports Si-LAM by $13.61$,pp by removing the Si-sensitive low-voltage tail. We propose a practical protocol: correct only the instantaneous ohmic term, harmonize the voltage window, and base quantitative attribution on the discharge branch, treating anomalous/negative component LAMs on charge as allocation artefacts rather than recovery.

AI.tldr: 传统DMA方法在分析电池容量衰减时，会因欧姆压降和迟滞效应产生"幻影"材料损失，导致LLI和LAM的错误诊断。通过IR校正和标准化协议可提高分析准确性。
AI.motivation: 当前广泛使用的降解模式分析(DMA)方法在分解容量衰减为锂库存损失(LLI)和活性材料损失(LAM)时，存在一个关键问题：测量的伪开路电压(pOCV)包含非降解因素(欧姆压降和迟滞效应)，这些因素会主导诊断结果，产生"幻影"材料损失，导致错误的降解归因。
AI.method: 使用两种商用21700电池(LG M50T高电阻和Molicel P45B低电阻)，从约50ms脉冲步骤中提取SOC相关的瞬时电阻RΩ(SOC)，在拟合前对pOCV进行IR校正。通过比较不同电压窗口(2.5-4.2V vs 3.0-4.2V)和充放电分支的分析结果，评估传统DMA方法的误差。
AI.result: 在LG M50T中，IR校正使低倍率放电pOCV随老化提升13-27mV；未校正时，正极LAM被低估(晚期相对误差达-8.80%)，LLI被抑制(中值-3.07%)，同时石墨损失被夸大。在P45B中，在公平分支的3.0-4.2V窗口，寿命末期充电分支DMA报告更高的正极LAM(+3.42pp)和LLI(+5.36pp)，而放电分支检测到更大的硅LAM(充放电差异达+14.38pp)。提高电压下限(2.5→3.0V)会进一步低估硅LAM达13.61pp。
AI.conclusion: 提出实用协议：仅校正瞬时欧姆项，统一电压窗口，基于放电分支进行定量归因，将充电分支中的异常/负分量LAM视为分配伪影而非实际恢复。这能显著提高DMA分析的准确性，避免"幻影"材料损失的误诊。

title: Multiple topological phases of magnons induced by Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya and pseudodipolar anisotropic exchange interactions in Kagome ferromagnets
summary: Kagome magnets naturally hosting Dirac points and flat bands exhibit novel topological phases, enabling rich interplays between interactions and topologies. The discovery of two-dimensional (2D) magnets generally coexisting with different types of magnetic interactions poses a challenge for topological magnonic manipulation. Here we investigate the topological magnon phases of 2D Kagome ferromagnet with multiple magnetic anisotropic interactions, i.e. Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya interaction (DMI) and pseudo-dipolar interaction (PDI). It is found that the different sole magnetic anisotropic interactions introduce completely distinct topological phase diagrams and topological states. The multiple topological magnon phases with high Chern number emerge due to the distinct anisotropic interactions. Moreover, the interplay of the multiple anisotropic DMI and PDI interactions involved with Dirac and flat bands controls a variety of topological phase transitions, implying greater manipulation potential. In addition, the sign reversal of thermal Hall and Nernst conductivities induced by temperature is found in particular topological phase regions, namely topological origin, relating to the energy gap and Berry curvature (Chern number) in the vicinity of magnetic phase transition from the thermal fluctuations, providing a possible explanation for the experimental puzzles. All these results demonstrate that the novel topological magnonic properties in Kagome magnet with multiple magnetic anisotropic interactions can realize a potential platform for magnonic devices and quantum computing.

AI.tldr: 该研究探讨了具有多种磁各向异性相互作用（DMI和PDI）的二维Kagome铁磁体中的拓扑磁振子相，揭示了这些相互作用如何产生不同的拓扑相图、高陈数相以及温度诱导的热霍尔和能斯特电导率符号反转等新颖拓扑磁振子特性。
AI.motivation: Kagome磁体天然具有狄拉克点和平带，展现出新颖的拓扑相，为相互作用与拓扑之间的丰富交织提供了平台。然而，二维磁体中通常共存多种磁相互作用类型，这对拓扑磁振子操控提出了挑战。因此，需要研究具有多种磁各向异性相互作用的二维Kagome铁磁体中的拓扑磁振子相。
AI.method: 研究通过理论分析二维Kagome铁磁体中的多种磁各向异性相互作用，包括Dzyaloshinskii-Moriya相互作用（DMI）和赝偶极相互作用（PDI）。探讨这些相互作用如何影响拓扑相图、拓扑态以及狄拉克点和平带的性质。
AI.result: 发现不同的磁各向异性相互作用引入完全不同的拓扑相图和高陈数拓扑磁振子相。多种各向异性相互作用的交织控制着各种拓扑相变。在特定拓扑相区域观察到温度诱导的热霍尔和能斯特电导率符号反转，这与磁相变附近能隙和陈数（贝里曲率）的拓扑起源相关。
AI.conclusion: 具有多种磁各向异性相互作用的Kagome磁体展现出新颖的拓扑磁振子特性，为实现磁振子器件和量子计算的潜在平台提供了可能，并为实验中的一些谜题提供了可能的解释。

title: Dielectric and gate metal engineering for threshold voltage modulation in enhancement mode monolayer MoS2 field effect transistors
summary: Excellent gate electrostatics in field effect transistors (FETs) based on two-dimensional transition metal dichalcogenide (2D TMD) channels can dramatically decrease static power dissipation. Energy efficient FETs operate in enhancement mode with small and positive threshold voltage (Vth) for n-type devices. However, most state-of-the-art FETs based on monolayer MoS2 channel operate in depletion mode with negative Vth due to doping from the underlying dielectric substrate. In this work, we identify key properties of the semiconductor/dielectric interface (MoS2 on industrially relevant high dielectric constant (k) HfO2, ZrO2 and hBN for reference) responsible for realizing enhancement-mode operation of 2D MoS2 channel FETs. We find that hBN and ZrO2 dielectric substrates provide low defect interfaces with MoS2 that enables effective modulation of the Vth using gate metals of different work functions (WFs). We use photoluminescence (PL) and synchrotron X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS) measurements to investigate doping levels in monolayer MoS2 on different dielectrics with different WF gate metals. We complement the FET and spectroscopic measurements with capacitance-voltage analysis on dielectrics with varying thicknesses, which confirm that Vth modulation in ZrO2 devices is correlated with WF of the gate metals - in contrast with HfO2 devices that exhibit signatures of Vth pinning induced by oxide/interface defect states. Finally, we demonstrate FETs using a 2D MoS2 channel and a 6 nm of ZrO2 dielectric, achieving a subthreshold swing of 87 mV dec-1 and a threshold voltage of 0.1 V. Our results offer insights into the role of dielectric/semiconductor interface in 2D MoS2 based FETs for realizing enhancement mode FETs and highlight the potential of ZrO2 as a scalable high-k dielectric.

AI.tldr: 该研究探讨了如何通过优化二维MoS₂场效应晶体管中的半导体/介电界面，实现增强型操作模式，发现ZrO₂作为高k介电材料能有效调控阈值电压，避免Vth钉扎效应。
AI.motivation: 大多数基于单层MoS₂通道的FET工作在耗尽模式（负阈值电压），这是由于底层介电基底的掺杂效应。需要实现增强型操作（小正阈值电压）以降低静态功耗，提高能效。
AI.method: 研究比较了不同介电材料（HfO₂、ZrO₂和hBN）与MoS₂的界面特性，通过光致发光、同步辐射X射线光电子能谱、电容-电压分析等表征手段，结合不同功函数栅金属的阈值电压调制实验。
AI.result: 发现hBN和ZrO₂介电基底与MoS₂形成低缺陷界面，能有效通过栅金属功函数调控阈值电压；而HfO₂器件则表现出由氧化物/界面缺陷态引起的Vth钉扎效应。最终使用6nm ZrO₂介电层实现了87mV/dec的亚阈值摆幅和0.1V的阈值电压。
AI.conclusion: 研究阐明了介电/半导体界面在二维MoS₂基FET中的关键作用，为实现增强型FET提供了重要见解，并突出了ZrO₂作为可扩展高k介电材料的潜力。

title: Effect of Underlayer Induced Charge Carrier Substitution on the Superconductivity of Ti40V60 Alloy Thin Films
summary: The influence of metallic and semiconducting (V, Al, and Si) under-layer induced charge carrier substitution on the superconducting properties of the Ti40V60 alloy thin films are studied and also compared with a pristine reference film without any under-layer. All the films exhibit metallic behavior in the normal state and a superconducting transition at low temperatures, where the superconducting transition temperature is tunable between 4.77 K and 5.73 K. Hall measurements on the films reveal that the under-layer strongly affects the charge carrier type and density, leading to a correlation between increasing carrier concentration and decreasing TC. The Si under-layer introduces the highest disorder yet yields the highest TC, indicating that in the Ti40V60 alloys, moderate disorder suppresses the spin-fluctuations induced pair breaking, thereby enhancing the superconductivity. The comparable TC of the V under-layer and pristine films without under-layer, along with a coherence length (~6.2 nm) much smaller than the film thickness (25 nm), confirms the absence of any significant proximity effects. These findings demonstrate that under-layer engineering provides an effective route to tune the superconducting properties of Ti-V alloy thin films.

AI.tldr: 研究金属/半导体底层对Ti40V60合金薄膜超导性能的影响，发现底层可调控载流子类型和浓度，从而调节超导转变温度（4.77-5.73K）。
AI.motivation: 探索通过底层工程调控Ti-V合金薄膜超导性能的有效途径，研究不同底层材料（V、Al、Si）对载流子替代和超导特性的影响。
AI.method: 制备Ti40V60合金薄膜，分别添加V、Al、Si底层和制备无底层的原始薄膜作为对照。通过霍尔测量分析载流子类型和浓度，测量超导转变温度，分析相干长度与薄膜厚度的关系。
AI.result: 所有薄膜在正常态呈金属行为，超导转变温度在4.77-5.73K可调。底层显著影响载流子类型和密度，载流子浓度增加导致TC降低。Si底层引入最高无序度但产生最高TC，表明适度无序可抑制自旋涨落诱导的配对破坏。V底层与无底层薄膜TC相近，相干长度远小于薄膜厚度，排除显著邻近效应。

title: Magneto-Moiré Excitons in Twisted Bilayer CrSBr
summary: Moiré superlattices in van der Waals materials have revolutionized the study of electronic and excitonic systems by creating periodic electrostatic potentials. Extending this concept to magnetic materials promises new pathways in merging spintronics with photonics. While moiré magnetism has been revealed with near-field probes and nonlinear optical techniques, the coupling of these magnetic textures to optical excitations - magneto-moiré excitons - remains unexplored. Here, we report the observation of magneto-moiré excitons in twisted bilayer CrSBr, correlated with moiré spin textures that emerge below a critical twist angle of ~2°. The nanoscale moiré spin texture imprints distinct signatures onto the optical spectrum, shifting the exciton energy via a periodic magnetic exchange field. First-principles calculations corroborate that these signatures arise from one-dimensional spin textures governed by the balance of exchange interactions and domain wall energy. Our results demonstrate that moiré magnetism can be used to engineer nanoscale excitonic energy landscapes, providing a new platform for magneto-optical sensing, quantum transduction, and control of non-collinear magnetism and topology through light.

AI.tldr: 在扭曲双层CrSBr中首次观测到磁-莫尔激子，这些激子与莫尔自旋纹理相关，在临界扭曲角~2°以下出现，为磁光传感和量子转导提供了新平台。
AI.motivation: 莫尔超晶格在范德华材料中已成功应用于电子和激子系统，但将其扩展到磁性材料以结合自旋电子学和光子学仍待探索。虽然已有近场探针和非线性光学技术揭示了莫尔磁性，但这些磁结构与光学激发的耦合（磁-莫尔激子）尚未被研究。
AI.method: 使用扭曲双层CrSBr材料，在临界扭曲角~2°以下观测磁-莫尔激子。通过光学光谱分析纳米级莫尔自旋纹理对激子能量的影响，并结合第一性原理计算验证这些特征源于一维自旋纹理，由交换相互作用和畴壁能量平衡决定。
AI.result: 成功观测到磁-莫尔激子，其与莫尔自旋纹理相关。纳米级莫尔自旋纹理通过周期性磁交换场改变激子能量，在光学光谱中留下独特特征。第一性原理计算证实这些特征源于一维自旋纹理。
AI.conclusion: 莫尔磁性可用于工程化纳米级激子能量景观，为磁光传感、量子转导以及通过光控制非共线磁性和拓扑提供了新平台，实现了自旋电子学与光子学的融合。

title: Rapid reduction of nitrophenols using reusable magnetic \textit{h}-BN/Ni--NiO nanocomposites
summary: The efficient and cost-effective conversion of nitro compounds to amines is crucial for industrial processes and environmental remediation, highlighting the growing demand for earth-abundant metal-based catalysts. In this study, magnetic Ni--NiO nanostructures and their composites with two-dimensional hexagonal boron nitride (\textit{h}-BN) were synthesized via a simple and scalable combustion method. The structural, morphological, and compositional properties of the synthesized materials were systematically investigated using powder X-ray diffraction (PXRD), scanning electron microscopy (SEM), transmission electron microscopy (TEM), X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS), and UV--Vis spectroscopy. The catalytic activity of both Ni--NiO and \textit{h}-BN/Ni--NiO nanostructures was evaluated using nitrophenol reduction as a model reaction. The \textit{h}-BN/Ni--NiO nanocomposite exhibited significantly enhanced catalytic performance compared to pristine Ni--NiO, highlighting the synergistic interaction between \textit{h}-BN and Ni--NiO nanoparticles. Notably, the magnetic nature of the Ni--NiO core enabled facile recovery of the catalyst using an external magnetic field, and the composite demonstrated excellent stability and reusability for up to six catalytic cycles with minimal loss of activity. The combination of high catalytic efficiency, magnetic separability, and structural stability positions the \textit{h}-BN/Ni--NiO nanocomposite as a promising candidate for green and sustainable catalytic applications, particularly in environmental remediation.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过燃烧法合成了磁性Ni-NiO纳米结构及其与六方氮化硼(h-BN)的复合材料，用于硝基化合物还原为胺类的高效催化，h-BN/Ni-NiO复合材料展现出优异的催化性能、磁分离性和可重复使用性。
AI.motivation: 硝基化合物高效、经济地转化为胺类对工业过程和环境修复至关重要，需要开发基于地球丰富金属的催化剂来满足日益增长的需求。
AI.method: 采用简单可扩展的燃烧法合成磁性Ni-NiO纳米结构及其与二维h-BN的复合材料，通过PXRD、SEM、TEM、XPS和UV-Vis光谱系统表征材料的结构、形貌和组成，并以硝基苯酚还原为模型反应评估催化活性。
AI.result: h-BN/Ni-NiO纳米复合材料相比纯Ni-NiO展现出显著增强的催化性能，Ni-NiO核的磁性使催化剂可通过外部磁场轻松回收，复合材料在六个催化循环中表现出优异的稳定性和可重复使用性，活性损失最小。

title: Tensor-network study of the ground state of maple-leaf Heisenberg antiferromagnet
summary: We study the quantum phase diagram of the spin-$1/2$ nearest-neighbor Heisenberg model on the maple-leaf lattice using infinite projected entangled pair states (iPEPS) combined with a corner transfer matrix renormalization group scheme adapted to $C_3$-symmetric lattices. Focusing on the fully antiferromagnetic $J$-$J_d$ model with $J_h = J_t := J$, we map out the ground-state phase diagram as a function of the dimer coupling $J_d$. Our results show that the system hosts only two phases: a magnetically ordered canted-$120^\circ$ phase and an exact dimer singlet product phase. We identify a first-order transition between these two phases at $J_d/J \approx 1.45$. Within the magnetically ordered phase, we observe small but finite magnetic moments. We also resolve the quantum renormalization of the canting angle, which deviates from the classical prediction over almost the entire magnetically ordered phase.

AI.tldr: 使用iPEPS方法研究枫叶晶格上自旋-1/2最近邻海森堡模型的量子相图，发现系统仅存在两个相：磁有序的倾斜120°相和精确二聚体单重态乘积相，两者之间存在一级相变。
AI.motivation: 研究枫叶晶格上自旋-1/2海森堡模型的量子相图，特别是理解在反铁磁耦合参数变化下系统的基态相行为。
AI.method: 使用无限投影纠缠对态(iPEPS)结合角转移矩阵重整化群方案，该方法专门适用于C3对称晶格，研究J-Jd模型中的基态相图。
AI.result: 系统仅存在两个相：磁有序的倾斜120°相和精确二聚体单重态乘积相，两者之间存在一级相变，相变点位于Jd/J≈1.45。在磁有序相中观察到小而有限的磁矩，且倾斜角的量子重整化在整个磁有序相中都与经典预测不同。

title: Ultrahigh Charge-to-Spin Conversion and Tunneling Magnetoresistance in Quasi-Two-Dimensional d-wave Altermagnet
summary: The emergence of altermagnets has driven groundbreaking advances in spintronics. Notably, d-wave altermagnets support non-relativistic spin transport, efficient charge-to-spin conversion, and T-odd spin currents. In addition, their integration as electrodes in antiferromagnetic tunnel junctions (AFMTJs) enables a tunneling magnetoresistance (TMR) effect, allowing electrical detection of Néel vectors for next-generation memory devices. In this work, we investigate the non-relativistic spin transport properties of the quasi-two-dimensional (quasi-2D) d-wave altermagnet KV\textsubscript{2}Se\textsubscript{2}O and the TMR effect in KV\textsubscript{2}Se\textsubscript{2}O-based AFMTJs via first-principles calculations. Our results reveal that KV\textsubscript{2}Se\textsubscript{2}O exhibits a non-relativistic longitudinal spin polarization and a spin Hall angle both exceeding 60\% at room temperature, while KV\textsubscript{2}Se\textsubscript{2}O-based AFMTJs achieve a giant TMR reaching approximately $10^{12}$\%, which remains robust against Fermi level shifts. These findings highlight the anisotropic spin polarization inherent to d-wave staggered magnetism and underscore the critical role of Fermi surface topology in enhancing T-odd spin transport and the TMR effect in AFMTJs.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过第一性原理计算揭示了准二维d波交变磁体KV₂Se₂O的非相对论性自旋输运特性及其在反铁磁隧道结中的巨大隧穿磁阻效应。
AI.motivation: 交变磁体的出现推动了自旋电子学的突破性进展。d波交变磁体支持非相对论性自旋输运、高效电荷-自旋转换和T-odd自旋电流。将其作为电极集成到反铁磁隧道结中可实现隧穿磁阻效应，为下一代存储器件提供电学检测Néel矢量的能力。
AI.method: 通过第一性原理计算研究准二维d波交变磁体KV₂Se₂O的非相对论性自旋输运特性，以及基于KV₂Se₂O的反铁磁隧道结中的隧穿磁阻效应。
AI.result: KV₂Se₂O在室温下表现出超过60%的非相对论性纵向自旋极化和自旋霍尔角。基于KV₂Se₂O的反铁磁隧道结实现了约10¹²%的巨大隧穿磁阻，且对费米能级移动保持鲁棒性。
AI.conclusion: 研究结果突显了d波交错磁性固有的各向异性自旋极化，并强调了费米面拓扑在增强反铁磁隧道结中T-odd自旋输运和隧穿磁阻效应中的关键作用。

title: Universal quasi-degenerate orbital origin of two-dome phases in iron pnictide superconductors
comment: 36 pages, 16 figures; this article supersedes arXiv: 1701.02500
summary: A series of experiments revealed that novel bipartite magnetic and superconducting (SC) phases widely exist in the phase diagrams of iron pnictides and chalcogenides. Nevertheless, the origin of the two-dome magnetic and SC phases in iron-based compounds remains unclear. Here we theoretically investigated the electronic structures, magnetic and SC properties of three representative iron-based systems, i.e. LaFeAsO$_{1-x}$H$_{x}$, LaFeAs$_{1-x}$P$_{x}$O and KFe$_{2}$As$_{2}$. We propose a unified quasi-degenerate orbital mechanism for the emergence of the two-dome parent magnetic/structural phase and the subsequent two-dome SC phase. It is found that the degenerate in-plane anisotropic $d_{xz/yz}$ orbitals dominate the first magnetic/structural and SC phases, while in-plane isotropic orbitals $d_{xy}$ or $d_{3z^{2}-r^{2}}$ with quasi-degeneracy originating from quasi-symmetry drive the emergence of the second magnetic/SC dome phase. Moreover, a matching rule of spin and orbital modes for SC pairing state is proposed in multi-orbital iron-based systems. These results imply an orbital-driven mechanism as well as an orbital-selective scenario, and shed light on the understanding of the multi-dome magnetic and SC phases in multi-orbital systems.

AI.tldr: 该研究提出了一种统一的准简并轨道机制，解释了铁基超导体中双圆顶磁性和超导相的出现，揭示了不同轨道在驱动不同相变中的作用。
AI.motivation: 铁基超导体中广泛存在双圆顶磁性和超导相，但其起源尚不清楚。研究旨在揭示这些多圆顶相背后的统一机制。
AI.method: 理论研究了三种代表性铁基体系（LaFeAsO1-xHx、LaFeAs1-xPxO和KFe2As2）的电子结构、磁性和超导性质，提出了准简并轨道机制。
AI.result: 发现简并的d_{xz/yz}轨道主导第一个磁/结构和超导相，而准简并的d_{xy}或d_{3z^2-r^2}轨道驱动第二个磁/超导圆顶相。提出了多轨道体系中超导配对的自旋和轨道模式匹配规则。
AI.conclusion: 研究揭示了轨道驱动机制和轨道选择性方案，为理解多轨道体系中的多圆顶磁性和超导相提供了重要见解。

title: Spin noise of localized electrons in CdTe/CdMgTe quantum well
summary: The spin dynamics of localized electrons in bulk semiconductors is governed by the interplay of effective nuclear field fluctuations, spin exchange between electrons, and spin transitions into the conduction band. Using spin noise spectroscopy, we reveal this interplay for donor-bound electrons in a CdTe/CdMgTe quantum well and spectrally separate electron spin relaxation and dephasing in zero magnetic field. We identify a specific regime of the electron spin dynamics, where temperature-induced activation of spin-independent hopping leads to a monotonic acceleration of electron spin relaxation. This behavior contrasts with bulk CdTe crystals, where the motional narrowing effect is observed. We attribute this difference to the significantly larger inhomogeneous broadening of the donor-related trion resonance in our quantum well compared to bulk samples. The theoretical analysis of the spin noise power and the strength of the spin exchange interaction provides the estimation of the donor concentration in our unintentionally doped structure.

AI.tldr: 通过自旋噪声光谱研究CdTe/CdMgTe量子阱中施主束缚电子的自旋动力学，发现温度诱导的自旋无关跳跃导致自旋弛豫单调加速，与体材料中的运动变窄效应形成对比
AI.motivation: 研究局域电子在半导体中的自旋动力学，特别是施主束缚电子在零磁场下的自旋弛豫和退相干机制，比较量子阱结构与体材料的不同行为
AI.method: 使用自旋噪声光谱技术，在CdTe/CdMgTe量子阱中对施主束缚电子进行测量，通过理论分析自旋噪声功率和自旋交换相互作用强度

title: Validation of Quantum Computing for Transition Metal Oxide-based Automotive Catalysis
summary: Quantum computing presents a promising alternative to classical computational methods for modeling strongly correlated materials with partially filled d orbitals. In this study, we perform a comprehensive quantum resource estimation using quantum phase estimation (QPE) and qubitization techniques for transition metal oxide molecules and a Pd zeolite catalyst fragment. Using the binary oxide molecules TiO, MnO, and FeO, we validate our active space selection and benchmarking methodology, employing classical multireference methods such as complete active space self-consistent field (CASSCF) and N-electron valence state perturbation theory (NEVPT2). We then apply these methods to estimate the quantum resources required for a full-scale quantum simulation of a $Z_2Pd$ ($Z=Al_2Si_{22}O_{48}$) fragment taken from the $Pd/2(Al_xSi_{(1-x)})$ catalyst family where x=Si/Al. Our analysis demonstrates that for large Pd zeolite systems, simulations achieving chemical accuracy would require ~$10^6-10^7$ physical qubits, and range that is consistent with the projected capabilities of future fault-tolerant quantum devices. We further explore the impact of active space size, basis set quality, and phase estimation error on the required qubit and gate counts. These findings provide a roadmap for near-term and future quantum simulations of industrially relevant catalytic materials, offering insights into the feasibility and scaling of quantum chemistry applications in materials science.

AI.tldr: 该研究对过渡金属氧化物和钯沸石催化剂片段进行了量子资源估算，使用量子相位估计和量子比特化技术，预测实现化学精度需要约10^6-10^7个物理量子比特，与未来容错量子设备的预期能力相符。

AI.method: 使用量子相位估计和量子比特化技术进行量子资源估算；采用TiO、MnO、FeO等二元氧化物分子验证活性空间选择和基准方法；使用CASSCF和NEVPT2等多参考态经典方法进行基准测试；分析活性空间大小、基组质量和相位估计误差对量子资源需求的影响。

title: Quantum vs thermal fluctuations in phase transitions of two-dimensional superconductors
summary: We investigate the impact of quantum and thermal phase fluctuations on the suppression of superconducting order in two-dimensional systems. Within the two-dimensional quantum XY model in the phase representation, where on-site interaction terms govern quantum phase fluctuations, we perform extensive path-integral quantum Monte Carlo simulations. The resulting temperature-interaction phase diagram establishes the presence of a well-defined critical line ending at a quantum critical point at vanishing temperature with no indication of reentrant behavior. We further demonstrate that the resistance above the critical line reproduces the two expected different critical behaviors. For stronger interactions, above the quantum critical point, the system exhibits a crossover to an insulating regime at low temperatures. Finally, Monte Carlo calculations of current-current correlation functions enable us to extract the frequency-dependent conductivity in both superconducting and normal regimes, revealing a finite-frequency response that we attribute to quantum phase fluctuations.

AI.tldr: 研究二维系统中量子与热相位涨落对超导序的抑制效应，通过量子蒙特卡洛模拟揭示相图、临界行为和绝缘态转变
AI.motivation: 探究二维超导系统中量子相位涨落和热涨落如何共同抑制超导序，理解量子临界点附近的物理行为
AI.method: 采用二维量子XY模型的相位表示，通过路径积分量子蒙特卡洛模拟，计算温度-相互作用相图、电阻行为和电流-电流关联函数
AI.result: 发现明确的临界线终止于零温量子临界点，无重入行为；强相互作用下系统在低温出现绝缘态转变；量子相位涨落导致有限频率电导响应
